title: Million-Man Atzeres Organizing
body: Chareidi leaders meet in Bnei Brak to discuss a "million-man protest" in response to the draft law and recent arrest of yeshiva bochurim, but no final decisions have been made.

title: Released Hostage Visits Rav Hirsch
body: Released hostage Bar Avraham Kupershtein visits Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch in Bnei Brak, recalling his time in Hamas captivity. Nationwide tefillos were held on his behalf. He shared a personal moment, saying he made Kiddush on water inside the tunnels.
